Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: E. Kremer
Reviews.Content: I've owned several Canon cameras including the EOS 20D, EOS 60D and others. The EOS 70D outshines them all. The autofocus is terrific, very fast. The lenses included in this package might not be the most expensive, but they perform very well. The products were packaged w/great care & arrived in perfect condition, on time.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 15 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens + <2> Canon EF-S 55-250mm STM Lens + <3> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card +
<4> Spare LP-E6 Battery + <5> Battery Charger for LP-E6 + <6> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <7> Universal Pop-Up Diffuser +
<8> PD DSLR Sling Backpack + <9> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <10> 58mm UV Filter + <11> Additional 58mm UV Filter +
<12> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <13> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <15> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm & 55-250mm IS STM Lens + 64GB Card + Battery + Charger + Backpack + Tele/Wide Lens Kit
